languages.text: "Во избежание недоразумений оповещаю: я не выношу суждений, а собираю информацию по поручению маршала Стракса". {n}Префект поворачивается к Соломону.{/n} "Проктор Антар, оценивать вы будете сами себя, я только озвучиваю положения. Приступим: как вы характеризуете свою эффективность с учетом следующих фактов..." {n}Вультур извлекает пергаментный список.{/n}

"So as to avoid misunderstanding, allow me to clarify that I am not making any judgement, but rather gathering information at Marshal Strachs's request." {n}The prefect turns to Solomorne.{/n} "Proctor Anthar, you will be evaluating your own conduct in this instance; for my part, I will merely state a few key points. Let us begin: how would you describe your performance, taking into account the following facts..." {n}Vultur produces a parchment scroll.{/n}

Приступим: как вы характеризуете свою эффективность с учетом следующих фактов..." {n}Вультур извлекает пергаментный список.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So as to avoid any misunderstanding, allow me to stress that I am not making any judgement, but rather gathering information at Marshal Strachs's request." {n}The prefect turns to Solomorne.{/n} "Proctor Anthar, you will be the one evaluating your own conduct, whereas I will merely state some key points. Let us begin: how would you describe your performance, taking into account the following facts..." {n}Vultur produces a parchment scroll.{/n}

languages.text:
「誤解を避けるために申し上げておきますが、私は何らかの判断を下すのではなく、ストラッチス将帥の依頼により情報を集めているだけです」{n}総監はソロモーンに向き直る。{/n}
「アンサール代理人、今回の件についてはご自身の行動を評価していただきます。私としては、いくつかの重要な点を述べるにとどまります。それでは始めましょう。以下の事実を踏まえて、ご自分の働きをどう評価されますか…」{n}ヴァルターが羊皮紙の巻物を取り出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So as to avoid misunderstanding, allow me to clarify that I am not making any judgement, but rather gathering information at Marshal Strachs's request." {n}The prefect turns to Solomorne.{/n} "Proctor Anthar, you will be evaluating your own conduct in this instance; for my part, I will merely state a few key points. Let us begin: how would you describe your performance, taking into account the following facts..." {n}Vultur produces a parchment scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
「誤解を避けるために申し上げておきますが、私は何らかの判断を下すのではなく、ストラッチス将帥の依頼により情報を集めているだけです」{n}総監はソロモーンに向き直る。{/n}
「アンサール代理人、今回の件についてはご自身の行動を評価していただきます。私としては、いくつかの重要な点を述べるにとどまります。それでは始めましょう。以下の事実を踏まえて、ご自分の働きをどう評価されますか…」{n}ヴァルターが羊皮紙の巻物を取り出した。{/n}

languages.text: "Um Missverständnissen vorzubeugen, möchte ich klarstellen, dass ich kein Urteil abgebe, sondern auf Befehl von Marschall Strachs Informationen sammle. {n}Die Präfektin wendet sich Solomorne zu.{/n} "Proktor Anthar, Ihr werdet in diesem Fall Euer eigenes Verhalten evaluieren, während ich für meinen Teil lediglich einige wichtige Punkte nennen werde. Fangen wir an: Wie würdet Ihr Eure Leistung unter Berücksichtigung folgender Fakten beschreiben ..." {n}Vultur zückt eine Pergamentrolle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So as to avoid misunderstanding, allow me to clarify that I am not making any judgement, but rather gathering information at Marshal Strachs's request." {n}The prefect turns to Solomorne.{/n} "Proctor Anthar, you will be evaluating your own conduct in this instance; for my part, I will merely state a few key points. Let us begin: how would you describe your performance, taking into account the following facts..." {n}Vultur produces a parchment scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Um Missverständnissen vorzubeugen, möchte ich klarstellen, dass ich kein Urteil abgebe, sondern auf Befehl von Marschall Strachs Informationen sammle. {n}Die Präfektin wendet sich Solomorne zu.{/n} "Proktor Anthar, Ihr werdet in diesem Fall Euer eigenes Verhalten evaluieren, während ich für meinen Teil lediglich einige wichtige Punkte nennen werde. Fangen wir an: Wie würdet Ihr Eure Leistung unter Berücksichtigung folgender Fakten beschreiben ..." {n}Vultur zückt eine Pergamentrolle.{/n}

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de couper court à tout malentendu : je n'émets là aucun jugement, je me contente de rassembler des informations, sur ordre du maréchal Strachs. {n}La préfète se tourne vers Solomorne.{/n} Proctor Anthar, je vous laisserai le soin d'évaluer votre propre conduite. Pour ma part, je me contenterai d'évoquer quelques points importants. Commençons : comment décririez-vous vos performances, en prenant en considération les éléments suivants... » {n}Vultur dévoile un parchemin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So as to avoid misunderstanding, allow me to clarify that I am not making any judgement, but rather gathering information at Marshal Strachs's request." {n}The prefect turns to Solomorne.{/n} "Proctor Anthar, you will be evaluating your own conduct in this instance; for my part, I will merely state a few key points. Let us begin: how would you describe your performance, taking into account the following facts..." {n}Vultur produces a parchment scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de couper court à tout malentendu : je n'émets là aucun jugement, je me contente de rassembler des informations, sur ordre du maréchal Strachs. {n}La préfète se tourne vers Solomorne.{/n} Proctor Anthar, je vous laisserai le soin d'évaluer votre propre conduite. Pour ma part, je me contenterai d'évoquer quelques points importants. Commençons : comment décririez-vous vos performances, en prenant en considération les éléments suivants... » {n}Vultur dévoile un parchemin.{/n}

languages.text: «Para evitar malentendidos, quiero aclarar que no estoy pronunciándome sobre ningún asunto, solo recopilando información a petición del Mariscal Strachs». {n}La prefecta se gira hacia Solomorne.{/n} «Procurador Anthar, en este caso evaluará usted su propia conducta. Por mi parte, me limitaré a destacar ciertos aspectos clave. Empecemos: ¿Cómo describiría su conducta a la luz de los siguientes hechos?». {n}Vultur saca un rollo de pergamino.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So as to avoid misunderstanding, allow me to clarify that I am not making any judgement, but rather gathering information at Marshal Strachs's request." {n}The prefect turns to Solomorne.{/n} "Proctor Anthar, you will be evaluating your own conduct in this instance; for my part, I will merely state a few key points. Let us begin: how would you describe your performance, taking into account the following facts..." {n}Vultur produces a parchment scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Para evitar malentendidos, quiero aclarar que no estoy pronunciándome sobre ningún asunto, solo recopilando información a petición del Mariscal Strachs». {n}La prefecta se gira hacia Solomorne.{/n} «Procurador Anthar, en este caso evaluará usted su propia conducta. Por mi parte, me limitaré a destacar ciertos aspectos clave. Empecemos: ¿Cómo describiría su conducta a la luz de los siguientes hechos?». {n}Vultur saca un rollo de pergamino.{/n}

languages.text: “为了避免误解，请允许我在此澄清一下。我并不是在评判任何人，仅仅是在按照斯塔克斯元帅的要求收集情报。”{n}行政官的目光转向了索罗蒙。{/n}“安萨监察官，你需要自行评估你在这件事情上的表现。至于我，我仅仅负责陈述几个关键事实而已。既然如此，我们开始吧。你需要根据以下实际情况，对你自己的表现进行评估……”{n}沃尔图尔行政官取出了一份卷轴。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So as to avoid misunderstanding, allow me to clarify that I am not making any judgement, but rather gathering information at Marshal Strachs's request." {n}The prefect turns to Solomorne.{/n} "Proctor Anthar, you will be evaluating your own conduct in this instance; for my part, I will merely state a few key points. Let us begin: how would you describe your performance, taking into account the following facts..." {n}Vultur produces a parchment scroll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “为了避免误解，请允许我在此澄清一下。我并不是在评判任何人，仅仅是在按照斯塔克斯元帅的要求收集情报。”{n}行政官的目光转向了索罗蒙。{/n}“安萨监察官，你需要自行评估你在这件事情上的表现。至于我，我仅仅负责陈述几个关键事实而已。既然如此，我们开始吧。你需要根据以下实际情况，对你自己的表现进行评估……”{n}沃尔图尔行政官取出了一份卷轴。{/n}

languages.text: "Yanlış anlaşılmanın önüne geçmek için yargıda bulunmadığımı, yalnızca Miralay Strachs'ın isteği üzerine bilgi topladığımı açıklığa kavuşturmak isterim." {n}Prefekt, Solomorne'a dönüyor.{/n} "Üsteğmen Anthar, bu kez kendi davranışlarınızı kendiniz değerlendireceksiniz. Ben yalnızca birkaç önemli noktaya değineceğim. Başlayalım... Birazdan sarf edeceğim gerçekleri göz önünde bulundurarak performansınızı nasıl tanımlarsınız?" {n}Vultur, eline bir parşömen alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So as to avoid misunderstanding, allow me to clarify that I am not making any judgement, but rather gathering information at Marshal Strachs's request." {n}The prefect turns to Solomorne.{/n} "Proctor Anthar, you will be evaluating your own conduct in this instance; for my part, I will merely state a few key points. Let us begin: how would you describe your performance, taking into account the following facts..." {n}Vultur produces a parchment scroll.{/n}
